00061 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00062 #include <config.h>
00063 #include <stdlib.h>
00064 #include <library/i_error.h>
00065 #include <library/l_alloc_new.h>
00066 #include <library/i_global.h>
00067 #include <library/i_hash.h>
00068 
00069 
00070 L_Alloc_Pool *HashElementPool = NULL;
00071 L_Alloc_Pool *HashTablePool = NULL;
00072 
00073 HashTable HashTable_create (int size)
00074 {
00075   int indx;
00076   HashTable hash_table;
00077 
00078   for (indx = 3; indx <= 31; indx++)
00079     {
00080       if (size <= (1 << indx))
00081         {
00082           size = (1 << indx);
00083           break;
00084         }
00085     }
00086 
00087   if (HashTablePool == NULL)
00088     {
00089       HashTablePool =
00090         L_create_alloc_pool ("_HashTable", sizeof (_HashTable), 8);
00091     }
00092   if (HashElementPool == NULL)
00093     {
00094       HashElementPool =
00095         L_create_alloc_pool ("_HashElement", sizeof (_HashElement), 512);
00096     }
00097   hash_table = (HashTable) L_alloc (HashTablePool);
00098 
00099   hash_table->tbl = (HashElement *) malloc (sizeof (HashElement) * size);
00100   hash_table->mask = size - 1;
00101 
00102   for (indx = 0; indx < size; indx++)
00103     hash_table->tbl[indx] = NULL;
00104 
00105   return hash_table;
00106 }
00107 
00108 void
00109 HashTable_free (HashTable hash_table)
00110 {
00111   if (!hash_table)
00112     return;
00113 
00114   HashTable_reset (hash_table);
00115   free (hash_table->tbl);
00116   L_free (HashTablePool, hash_table);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void
00120 HashTable_free_func (HashTable hash_table, void (*ptr_free_func) (void *))
00121 {
00122   if (!hash_table)
00123     return;
00124 
00125   HashTable_reset_func (hash_table, ptr_free_func);
00126   free (hash_table->tbl);
00127   L_free (HashTablePool, hash_table);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void
00131 HashTable_reset (HashTable hash_table)
00132 {
00133   int indx;
00134 
00135   if (!hash_table)
00136     return;
00137 
00138   for (indx = 0; indx <= hash_table->mask; indx++)
00139     {
00140       HashElement element = hash_table->tbl[indx];
00141       while (element)
00142         {
00143           HashElement tmp = element->next;
00144           L_free (HashElementPool, element);
00145           element = tmp;
00146         }
00147       hash_table->tbl[indx] = NULL;
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00151 void
00152 HashTable_reset_func (HashTable hash_table, void (*ptr_free_func) (void *))
00153 {
00154   int indx;
00155 
00156   if (!hash_table)
00157     return;
00158 
00159   for (indx = 0; indx <= hash_table->mask; indx++)
00160     {
00161       HashElement element = hash_table->tbl[indx];
00162       while (element)
00163         {
00164           HashElement tmp = element->next;
00165           ptr_free_func (element->ptr);
00166           L_free (HashElementPool, element);
00167           element = tmp;
00168         }
00169       hash_table->tbl[indx] = NULL;
00170     }
00171 }
00172 
00173 void *
00174 HashTable_find (HashTable hash_table, int key)
00175 {
00176   unsigned int hash_val = HASH_FUNC (key) & hash_table->mask;
00177   HashElement element = hash_table->tbl[hash_val];
00178 
00179   while (element != NULL)
00180     {
00181       if (element->key == key)
00182         return (element->ptr);
00183       element = element->next;
00184     }
00185   I_punt ("Hash Table Element not found.");
00186 
00187   return (NULL);
00188 }
00189 
00190 void *
00191 HashTable_find_or_null (HashTable hash_table, int key)
00192 {
00193   unsigned int hash_val = HASH_FUNC (key) & hash_table->mask;
00194   HashElement element = hash_table->tbl[hash_val];
00195 
00196   while (element != NULL)
00197     {
00198       if (element->key == key)
00199         return (element->ptr);
00200       element = element->next;
00201     }
00202 
00203   return (NULL);
00204 }
00205 
00206 int
00207 HashTable_member (HashTable hash_table, int key)
00208 {
00209   unsigned int hash_val = HASH_FUNC (key) & hash_table->mask;
00210   HashElement element = hash_table->tbl[hash_val];
00211 
00212   while (element != NULL)
00213     {
00214       if (element->key == key)
00215         return (TRUE);
00216       element = element->next;
00217     }
00218 
00219   return (FALSE);
00220 }
00221 
00222 void
00223 HashTable_insert (HashTable hash_table, int key, void *ptr)
00224 {
00225   unsigned int hash_val;
00226   HashElement element;
00227 
00228   hash_val = HASH_FUNC (key) & hash_table->mask;
00229 
00230   element = (HashElement) L_alloc (HashElementPool);
00231   element->key = key;
00232   element->ptr = ptr;
00233 
00234   element->next = hash_table->tbl[hash_val];
00235   hash_table->tbl[hash_val] = element;
00236 }
00237 
00238 /* This does not free anything pointed to by element->ptr. */
00239 void
00240 HashTable_remove (HashTable hash_table, int key)
00241 {
00242   unsigned int hash_val = HASH_FUNC (key) & hash_table->mask;
00243   HashElement element = hash_table->tbl[hash_val];
00244   HashElement prev_element = NULL;
00245 
00246   while (element != NULL)
00247     {
00248       if (element->key == key)
00249         {
00250           if (prev_element != NULL)
00251             {
00252               prev_element->next = element->next;
00253             }
00254           else
00255             {
00256               hash_table->tbl[hash_val] = element->next;
00257             }
00258           L_free (HashElementPool, element);
00259           return;
00260         }
00261       prev_element = element;
00262       element = element->next;
00263     }
00264   I_punt ("Hash Table Element not found.");
00265 
00266 }
00267 
00268 /* Don't forget to free original */
00269 void
00270 HashTable_update (HashTable hash_table, int key, void *ptr)
00271 {
00272   unsigned int hash_val = HASH_FUNC (key) & hash_table->mask;
00273   HashElement element = hash_table->tbl[hash_val];
00274 
00275   while (element != NULL)
00276     {
00277       if (element->key == key)
00278         {
00279           /* Found */
00280           element->ptr = ptr;
00281           return;
00282         }
00283       element = element->next;
00284     }
00285 
00286   /* Not found, so insert */
00287   element = (HashElement) L_alloc (HashElementPool);
00288   element->key = key;
00289   element->ptr = ptr;
00290 
00291   element->next = hash_table->tbl[hash_val];
00292   hash_table->tbl[hash_val] = element;
00293 }
00294 
00295 void
00296 HashTable_start (HashTable hash_table)
00297 {
00298   hash_table->key_indx = -1;
00299   hash_table->elem_indx = NULL;
00300 }
00301 
00302 
00303 void *
00304 HashTable_next (HashTable hash_table)
00305 {
00306   HashElement element;
00307   int indx;
00308 
00309   if (hash_table->elem_indx && hash_table->elem_indx->next)
00310     {
00311       hash_table->elem_indx = hash_table->elem_indx->next;
00312       return hash_table->elem_indx->ptr;
00313     }
00314 
00315   for (indx = hash_table->key_indx + 1; indx <= hash_table->mask; indx++)
00316     {
00317       element = hash_table->tbl[indx];
00318       if (element)
00319         {
00320           hash_table->key_indx = indx;
00321           hash_table->elem_indx = element;
00322           return hash_table->elem_indx->ptr;
00323         }
00324     }
00325   hash_table->key_indx = -1;
00326   hash_table->elem_indx = NULL;
00327   return NULL;
00328 }
00329 
00330 int
00331 HashTable_key (HashTable hash_table)
00332 {
00333   return (hash_table->elem_indx ? hash_table->elem_indx->key : -1);
00334 }
